Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Eliminate the {@LinkCreature:8#4011#aberrant gulons}, {@LinkCreature:8#4021#reanimated popori}, {@LinkCreature:8#4032#caiman bonethralls}, {@LinkCreature:8#4031#skeletal caimans}, {@LinkCreature:8#4041#cruel inquisitors}, {@LinkCreature:8#4051#vulgar inquisitors}, {@LinkCreature:8#4052#vicious auric imps}, and {@LinkCreature:8#4061#undying miners}.

Report to Rendia in the Hungry Cavern Depths when mission is complete.
Great job out there. I love to reward good work.
If you want a reward, you'll need to actually do something worth rewarding.
